description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.
This set contains the following:

Playable Aircraft: XFA-27
A carrier-based stealth fighter designed for ultimate performance.
Its variable sweptback wings, canards, and unique wing construction featuring four tail wings grant it overwhelmingly superior mobility, making it a powerful force in any battle.
This set also includes 7 skins, including the special Scarface skin, and the new special weapon MSTM.

This aircraft can equip the SOD, MSTM, or IEWS as its special weapon.
name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - XFA-27 Set
